Package org.apache.turbine.services.localization

Class DateTimeFormatterService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.turbine.services.BaseInitable
      • org.apache.turbine.services.BaseService
        • org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineBaseService
          • org.apache.turbine.services.localization.DateTimeFormatterService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Initable, DateTimeFormatterInterface, Service
    public class DateTimeFormatterService
extends TurbineBaseService
implements DateTimeFormatterInterface
    This service is used to format TemporalAccessor and map(String, DateTimeFormatter, Locale) (different falvors) objects into strings. The methods may throw UnsupportedTemporalTypeException or DateTimeParseException. if the source and the target format do not match appropriately.

        public void init()
